Header: 11 Div Troops Clean Peradeniya Hospital to Mark Army Anniversary
Content: As one more project to coincide with the forthcoming 69th Army Anniversary, 11 Division troops of the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) commanded by Major General T.J Nanayakkara, General Officer Commanding, 11 Division on the  directions of Major General Rukmal Dias, Commander, Security Forces - Central carried out a two-day Shramadana campaign at Peradeniya Teaching Hospital during 5-6 October. Two Officers and fifty Other Rankers attended this cleaning event in the hospital premises with members of the hospital staff. Director and hospital staff commended the Army for their support.
